A '''Mojavatar''' (a portmanteau of "Mojang" and "Avatar") is an avatar created to represent a [[Mojang Studios]] employee.<ref name=marathonjnkboy>{{Tweet|jnkboy|158236760340578307|Only 1 day left to bid on all the @MC_Marathon auctions. If you've ever wanted a Mojavatar, this is your ONE chance! minecraftmarathon.org/prizes-and-auc‚Ä¶|January 14, 2012}}</ref><ref>{{Tweet|_LadyAgnes|1381214409553494021|I realized I haven't shared my Mojavatar! Quite late - but here it is! It was a lot of fun to create ‚ò∫Ô∏è<br><br>Just epic work on the Mojavatar Maker @artofsully, @cookiecat_9, @JohanAronson, @slamp0000 and the rest of the team! üåü|April 11, 2021}}</ref> Almost all developers and employees at Mojang have their own Mojavatar.<ref name=sullytweet>{{Tweet|artofsully|1354909486138454017|Some of you might have noticed a lot of @Mojang employees updating their profile pics recently, and I've finally got the go-ahead to share a sneak peek at the internal app I helped develop for us using @unity3d to create these lil avatars! (will showcase more later!) ‚ù§Ô∏è|January 28, 2021}}</ref> Mojavatars can usually be seen in news articles on [[minecraft.net]] or on the Mojang Staff's social media profiles.

The current Mojavatars are made with the ''Mojavatar Maker'', an internal private program for creating 3D avatars in a style similar to the ''[[Minecraft]]'' look. While this current iteration is most common, the two previous styles are still in use by some developers to this day, and can still be seen in some news articles.

== Mojavatar Maker ==
The '''Mojavatar Maker''' is the avatar creator program made by Mojang Studios to help themselves create new avatar images for the new or current staff, it uses a 3D Minecraft Chibi style with a low pixel resolution for the avatars and include a large variety of cosmetics, hair styles, etc.

It is for internal use only by Mojang Studios staff and there's currently no public version for public use.<ref>{{Tweet|artofsully|1354914833842507776|And alas no sorry friends, this isn't going to be a public tool since that would kindaaa defeat the purpose of giving Mojang staff our unique identity haha! That said, do check our jobs page and join us if u wanna be a part of the family! üòÑ<br><br>(or open Photoshop üòâ)|January 28, 2021}}</ref>

=== 2021‚Äìpresent: Mojavatar Maker ===
As the number of employees at Mojang grew, it became no longer viable to create avatars manually. In 2021 after the Mojang Studios rebrand, a group of developers therefore created an internal program, the Mojavatar Maker, to make the avatars more quickly and easily.<ref>{{Tweet|artofsully|1355587750855118854|Wow - thanks for the warm response to the Mojavatar project guys! Very much a side gig to normal work, it's nice to see it completed! ‚ù§Ô∏è<br><br>Traditionally avi's were made by hand but since Mojang has grown so much it's not as viable to do that anymore, thus Mojavatar Maker was born!|January 30, 2021}}</ref><ref name=sullytweet />

This is the current version of the Mojavatars. They are presented as a 3D model with a chibi and low pixel resolution style that almost all employees use currently.

== Contest winners ==
Two first-generation Mojavatars were awarded to non-developers through a contest held during a [[Minecraft Marathon]] event.<ref name=marathonjnkboy /><ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/20120116153304/http://minecraftmarathon.org:80/prizes-and-auctions/ Prizes and Auctions | Minecraft Marathon] ‚Äì archived on January 16, 2012</ref><ref>{{bluesky|marc-irl.bsky.social|3lcvnzv25h22w|I bet if someone really went digging they could find out about the only two first gen Mojang avatars that Junkboy made for non employees, through a contest for an event I ran called Minecraft Marathon.|December 9, 2024|userlink=[[Marc Watson]]}}</ref>

The first person outside of Mojang to use the Mojavatar Maker was a girl named Star, who won a {{W|Blue Peter|newtab=1}} competition in 2023 and created her own Mojavatar during a tour of Mojang Studios in Stockholm.<ref>{{ytl|SGfLt9bHoS4|What Does Minecraft HQ Look Like? ‚õè üá∏üá™ {{!}} Blue Peter {{!}} CBBC|CBBC|February 26, 2023}}</ref>

Another person granted access to the Mojavatar Maker was Lucie, a modder who won an auction and received the opportunity to visit Mojang‚Äôs office in Stockholm.<ref> {{tweet|DeveloperLucie|1604490991527874563|Jag vann precis auktionen! Ska bli s√• underbart att f√• tr√§ffa er alla üíï<br>Translated from Swedish by Google<br>I just won the auction! It will be so wonderful to meet you all üíï|December 18, 2022}}<br>{{tweet|DeveloperLucie|1634229905171832832|It was a dream come true, meeting you and @wChiwi was so amazing!|March 10, 2023}}</ref>
